doc.repnme: Transcript of two hundred fortieth special meeting of Executive Directors, held on Thursday, December 21, 1961 : India - Third Indian Iron and Steel Company Project
doc.abstracts: This partial transcript, from the session of the Executive Directors held on Thursday, December 21, 1961, covers only a proposed loan to India for the Third Indian Iron and Steel Company Project. The Executive Directors resolved to approve the loan. The discussion included an overview of the state of the Indian steel industry and the background and details of the loan. The Executive Directors resolved to approve the loan.
